text: William G. Schilling (August 30, 1939 - February 28, 2019) His daughter confirmed his death via Facebook. Dan Frischman offered condolences. Per Mr. Schilling's request, his death was and never will be in media outlets. was an American actor of film and television. He played Dr. Harold Samuels on the television series Head of the Class between 1986 and 1991. == Selected filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
